content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

1->2->6->14->12

This is the shortest path from node 11 to node 12 in the provided graph. The path consists of four edges: 11->2->6->14->12. Please note that the provided graph is directed and the order of edges indicates the direction of the path.

12->4->14->11

This is the shortest path from node 12 to node 11 in the provided graph. The path consists of three edges: 12->4->14->11. Please note that the provided graph is directed and the order of edges indicates the direction of the path.
